default.aboutUs: We are Lumea Education, an independent EduTech marketplace web application that aims to become an innovative online educational platform dedicated to self-improvement, offering interactive online courses, live video calls, synchronous learning, tutorial videos, and mentorship services.
default.jobDescription: We are seeking a passionate {position} who can play a critical role in building responsive, intuitive, and visually engaging digital experiences across both web and mobile platforms. You will work closely with cross-functional teams including UX researchers, designers, product managers, and other key stakeholders, turning creative design concepts into functional and high-performing code. You will lead the development of user interfaces, mentor junior developers, and ensure the technical feasibility of UX designs.
keyResponsibilities: Lead the development and maintenance of high-quality, responsive user interfaces for web and mobile applications.
Collaborate with UX designers, researchers, product managers, and cross-functional teams to translate design wireframes and prototypes into functional, production-ready code.
Ensure that applications are optimized for maximum speed, scalability, and performance.
Mentor junior developers, fostering a culture of learning, best practices, and continuous improvement.
Advocate for user-centric design, ensuring technical feasibility of UI/UX designs and contributing to the overall user experience strategy.
Continuously improve and refine our front-end codebase to meet evolving user and business needs.
qualifications: Proven experience in front-end technologies and frameworks, such as Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, and Express.
Strong understanding of responsive design principles and hands-on experience building interfaces for multiple devices.
Experience with version control systems like Git and familiarity with agile development practices.
Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to tackle complex technical challenges.
Strong communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively with both technical and non-technical team members.
Experience in mentoring or leading a team of developers is a plus.
default.specialNote: This is currently an unpaid (pro-bono) position as Lumea Education is an independent e-commerce project that is working towards the launch of its first phase MVP. Lumea Education intends to be established as a registered company in near future. Having said that, Lumea Education would like to note that we are planning to offer a form of compensation for your contribution to this project --- such as a contract --- once the circumstances change. In addition, you may receive some sort of reward for your contribution to this project as a volunteer.
